metadata.name: Crosswalk Moments
metadata.description:
In the spring of 2022 things are still returning back to normal in New York City. As the cars cautiously proceed, so do the citizens with their daily lives. Half-masked and fully vaccinated the world continues to turn at its own new pace.

Artist: Matt @ Static Motion NFT  
Location: New York, NY USA  
Dimension: 4032x 3024  
Resolution: 300 DPI  
Year Created: 2022

License:

With the purchase of this NFT, the artist grants the primary holder the license to sell, trade, or transfer the NFT on the blockchain. The NFT may be shown privately, in commercial and non-commercial venues, and in groups with an unlimited number of members. The license allows for unrestricted use and displays in virtual and real galleries, essays, and films. The holder of this non-exclusive license may also share on social media platforms with proper attribution.

The artist retains ownership of the underlying work's copyright, intellectual property rights, and reproduction rights. This art will be minted only once as 1/1 art on the Ethereum Blockchain, and no other editions will be produced on this or any other blockchain by the artist.
